headline: Is Boeing Set for Takeoff After 29% Rally and Recovery in 2025?
summary: Are you wondering what to do with Boeing stock right now? You are definitely not alone. After all, Boeing is not just any stock, it is an industrial bellwether, and its share price has been anything but boring lately. Whether you are sizing up where to put new cash to work or deciding if it is time to trim a winning position, Boeing's recent moves are worth a closer look. In just the past week, shares bounced up by 2.8%, a nice reversal after a shaky run last month when the stock slid 3.4%...

headline: Should Boeing Be Your Go-To Aviation Stock? A Deep Dive
summary: If you're asking whether Boeing (NYSE:BA) is the aviation stock you should lean on, the answer isn't going to be a simple yes or no. It will depend heavily on how much risk you're willing to absorb, what you believe about aircraft demand and regulatory trust, and whether you think Boeing's turnaround can be real.  Below is an in-depth, analytically grounded, look at Boeing: where it stands, what's going right, what's still a mess, and whether it deserves a place in your portfolio.  First, let's acknowledge what Boeing is: a global aerospace and defense conglomerate, not just a maker of commercial airliners.

headline: CCC, AEM sell magnetic amplifiers for V-22 aircraft to U.S. Navy
summary: OTTAWA, Ontario, Oct. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CCC is pleased to announce that it was awarded a contract by the United States Department of Defense (U.S. DoD) for magnetic amplifiers made by Anodyne Electronics Manufacturing Corp (AEM). The amplifiers will support the internal communication system of V-22 Osprey aircraft operated by the U.S. Navy. Based in Kelowna, British Columbia, AEM is a leading Canadian designer and manufacturer of specialized avionics and audio systems for mission-crit
